name: Space Avoiders
description:
A fun, action-packed spin on the classic Atari game, "Space Invaders."

Take control of little Ali N, an alien who got lost from the pack as they were invading Earth. Avoid missiles from tanks, and make it back to the safety of your group.

Check out my YouTube Channel where I'll be making a devlog of this game:

https://www.youtube.com/c/ChunkyPotatoGames/

Also check out the creator of this game's music:

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Song credits:

VGMA Challenge - July 2nd by Abstraction

VGMA Challenge - July 3rd by Abstraction

Ludum Dare 32 - Track 4 by Abstraction
